DOC.brief_summary: This questionnaire base study ( study drug involve ) ask patient uncontrolled type 2 diabetes diabetes pill choose insulin next treatment choice inhale insulin available addition currently available treatment , compare inhaled insulin available part currently available treatment . This study also ask patient uncontrolled type 2 diabetes currently manage diabetes pill + daily insulin choose next treatment choice take insulin multiple time day inhale insulin available addition currently available treatment , compare inhaled insulin available part currently available treatment .
DOC.brief_title: US Inhaled Insulin Therapeutic Choice Questionnaire Study
DOC.criteria: Male female , age > = 18 year < = 80 year diagnosis type 2 diabetes make least 6 month prior study entry Currently treat either : 2 oral antidiabetic agent , OR 1 oral antidiabetic agent insulin glargine Type 1 diabetes Smoking within past 6 month
